articles.title: Delhi: Fog disrupts life and travel in northern India - BBC.com
articles.description: Several flights and trains were delayed as a thick blanket of fog engulfed Delhi and surrounding areas.
articles.content:
A thick blanket of fog has engulfed Delhi and adjoining areas in northern India, leading to travel delays and chaos. 
More than 100 flights were delayed at the Delhi airport on Friday morning, accor… [+1327 chars]
